name: 30 HOWL
description:
#WizardJam

An approachable normal sized shoehorn of an endorsement of a pervasive title, derived from two pieces of art, shoehorning itself through the game in an intimidatingly weird and large fashion.

Mouse and Keyboard control.

I read Howl by Alan Ginsberg while watching third season of Twin Peaks and this is what happened.  Be warned though as I veered very far from the original material.

An interactive product with colors too bright and the gameplay too repetitive. Don't forget to drink your kool-aid and rage against the establishment. It's not like there is a button to kill your dreams or something.  

FYI there are three endings.
